title: Make bubbles feature work on Messages Pixel 3a XL
content:
The bubbles feature works for the Phone app but not on messages. It works sporadically for other things. I have it on in the developer options on in all the settings. I've done factory resets. Google support through chat has sent me here. 
version 5.9.093 (Wyvern_RC04.phone.openbeta_dynamic)
Please help. Thanks
